sentences.en: All of the obligations of the Guarantor hereunder shall be joint several.
sentences.cn: 担保人在本担保书项下承担的义务均应是连带的.

sentences.en: As your guarantor, we have signed a warranty to the bank.
sentences.cn: 现在我们作为你们公司的担保人, 已经向银行开出了担保书.

sentences.en: Body Language is foundation! Personal Management is guarantor!
sentences.cn: 肢体语言是基础! 自我管理是保障!

sentences.en: I must tell you, a hotel can't act as a shop guarantor. "
sentences.cn: 可是,我告诉你, 旅馆不能当铺保的. ”

sentences.en: Is a personal guarantor enough to get a loan?
sentences.cn: 有担保人能得到贷款 吗 ?

sentences.en: Now gives according to thedocument request my guarantor's telephone facsimile you.
sentences.cn: 依文件要求的现在将我担保人的联系电话传真给你们.

sentences.en: Or someone can sign with us as a guarantor.
sentences.cn: 或者有人能当担保人帮我们签字.

sentences.en: Perhaps you could get a guarantor.
sentences.cn: 也许你可以找一位担保人.

sentences.en: Size usually have a fund of several billion of the guarantor demanding.
sentences.cn: 一只基金规模通常有几十亿,对担保人的要求很高.

sentences.en: Someone thinking about acting as a guarantor should be clear what their obligations will be.
sentences.cn: 想做担保的人应该清楚他们将要承担的责任。

sentences.en: The guarantor shall be held liable within the agreed scope of guaranty.
sentences.cn: 担保人在约定的担保范围内承担责任.

sentences.en: What material should be a guarantor to the banks?
sentences.cn: 担保人要出什么材料给银行 呢 ?

sentences.en: You can't become his guarantor if you go there without money in your hands "

words.tran_cn: 保证；担保；保证人；保证书；抵押品
担保（guarantee的过去式和过去分词）

trans.tran_en: someone who promises to pay a debt if the person who should pay it does not
